scan_table_check.description: An application file (any record in sys_metadata) where the name starts with "Copy of" indicates work in progress, a file that is no longer used or just a copy that has been created by mistake. Such records should not be contained in any deployment.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Avoid "Copy of"
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Remove the file or at least rename the file properly.
scan_table_check.short_description: Application file names must not start with "Copy of"
